headline: Nordstrom Appoints Kelly Dilts as Chief Financial Officer
summary: Nordstrom, Inc. today announced the appointment of Kelly Dilts as chief financial officer, effective August 29. Dilts joins Nordstrom from Dollar General where she has served as executive vice president and chief financial officer since 2023. In this role, Dilts will oversee all core financial functions, as well as real estate, store development, and strategic sourcing.
